value.title: Elon Musk And AI Leaders Call For GPT-4 To Pause: Is It About Managing Risks Or Catching Up In The AI Race?
value.excerpt: Many of the people who signed the Pause letter have invested in AI. The pause will not manage the risks, but give AI investors time to catch up on the AI arms race. Instead of pausing, we need better regulation of AI based on the leadership principles of transparency and inclusion.
